entry.title: A suggestion
entry.content: Is a nice app, it still needs a few more adjustments to be rated as a great app, but is not impossible. The borders of the pictures i would advise to have them made so that they can be adjusted as thin or thick in sizes. Mostly is a good app, but it can become a lot better.

A suggestion

Is a nice app, it still needs a few more adjustments to be rated as a great app, but is not impossible. The borders of the pictures i would advise to have them made so that they can be adjusted as thin or thick in sizes. Mostly is a good app, but it can become a lot better.
